mailBody:
Dear [Recipient's Name],

I hope this message finds you well.

We have conducted a thorough review of the documentation for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32), and we would like to request additional information to complete our checklist.

The following items are currently missing or pending:
1. Company PEP Screening
2. Company Revenue Details
3. Company Market Capitalization Details

We appreciate your assistance in providing the necessary documentation or information related to these items at your earliest convenience.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Position]
[Your Company]
[Your Contact Information]
